issue.title: Allow gzclient window to be made smaller

content.raw:
@iche033 In #725, @nkoenig suggests that the window size should be set as a proportion of the screen size, but on multi-display systems (like my set-up with 4 24" panels), this can create extremely large windows. I don't know what facilities Qt has for full screen size vs the size of the active display, but if you can pick one, the latter would be great. 

Thanks for working on this!
